com.example.books4share.adapter

类 BookAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.books4share.adapter.BookAdapter.ViewHolder>

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Filterable

    public class BookAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.books4share.adapter.BookAdapter.ViewHolder>
implements android.widget.Filterable
    This class is BookAdapter which extends the RecyclerView Adapter holding the basic books information
